Articles.Content:
Could someone help me make a rocket that can orbit the Mun? It has to be made in 0.13 because I have not bought the full game yet. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I have tried many times to get into orbit, but they have always failed. >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) :(

Also some help for orbiting tricks would be nice to.
This stuff is all over the place on youtube and in the help section of this forum.

What VincentMcConnell said.

Check out this video from Scott Manley... it\'s a Stock Parts Munar Lander in 0.13:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/52HDyqAT0f8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
